name: Manipulation
display_help: You have an impressive presence that manifests in a variety of ways. Whether through charm, persuasion or outright intimidation, you can manipulate your foes' desire to fight you. Though this is a challenging set to master, and can get you into trouble if used injudiciously, the potential benefits are great.
power_short_helps: Self, Heal over Time, +DMG(All), +Rech, +Rec, Self Resurrect (Special)
